data.title: Infrastructure Providers and Consultants
data.meta_description: Get expert help from partners who have designed and built cloud infrastructure for companies of all sizes. OpenStack consultants can help you decide where to start and how to meet your unique cloud needs.
data.text:
Ultimum Services

Ultimum Services provides a complete set of services necessary to create and manage an OpenStack solution, including architecture, implementation and support. Additional services include customization, management and monitoring.

Details

NEC Cloud System

NEC provides cloud solutions for enterprises or services providers to use cloud services or build their cloud environment for optimizing operations or start new businesses quickly and efficiently. These are some of offerings and will be expanded.

Details

Red Hat Consulting

Red Hat Consulting helps customers in every stage of their cloud journey. Through a full suite of OpenStack offerings, we help build your strategy, accelerate adoption, and provide mentoring for seamless knowledge transfer.

Details

Storware Backup and Recovery

Storware Backup and Recovery provides comprehensive data protection and disaster recovery solutions for OpenStack, ensuring the safety and availability of critical workloads.

Details

Rackspace Elastic Engineering

Rackspace Elastic Engineering provides customers with a pod of highly skilled OpenStack and Kubernetes experts who collaborate and shape successful outcomes using a flexible cloud operating and pricing model with no long term commitment.

Details

Dell Consulting

For more than 30 years, Dell has empowered countries, communities, customers and people everywhere to use technology to realize their dreams. Customers trust us to deliver technology solutions that help them do and achieve more.

Details

Cloudification Consulting

Cloudification team has 10+ years of OpenStack experience solving most challenging cases. From Architecture & Development to Scaling and Release upgrades, Cloudification will be your guide in the world of OpenStack. Get more from OpenStack with us.

Details

99cloud Consulting

99Cloud,the first Chinese professional OpenStack service provider,offers OpenStack Consultant, Design, Build, Run, Training&Certification. We deliver the integration OpenStack solution and fill in the last kilometer for enterprise OpenStack adoption.

Details

VEXXHOST Consulting for OpenStack

VEXXHOST’s consulting service is designed to get your OpenStack projects up and running quickly and smoothly. We help reduce both the time and risks involved with OpenStack upgrades and component applications, as well as guidance on your strategy.

Details

OPENSTACK CONSULTING AND INTEGRATION

EasyStack is a trusted pure OpenStack leader in Asia. We can provide professional OpenStack service to help customer design, build and manage private, hybrid and public cloud.

Details

StackHPC Consulting for OpenStack

StackHPC is an OpenStack and Cloud design consultancy. Formed in 2016, our headquarters is in Bristol, UK, where the majority of our staff are based. We work with our clients to develop solutions that address the gaps in cloud for research computing.

Details

C-DAC Consulting & Integration services

C-DAC is offering consultancy services and involved in implementation, customization, development, management, operation, maintenance and support of Cloud with its free and open source cloud suite named Meghdoot built on OpenStack.

Details

Canonical’s Private Cloud Build

Canonical’s Private Cloud Build is a fixed-price consulting package for an OpenStack design and delivery on Ubuntu. It includes workload assessment, hardware guidance, design workshops, cloud deployment and post-deployment validation.

Details
